comment.author: 35111182@N05
comment._content:
There's an almost palpable air of urgency and 'last chance to see' about this image. Interesting to think that this photo will have been just one of a great many taken on that day. All those individual shots, taken by so many people and all placed into albums or keepsake boxes and stored away in a sideboard or maybe even a shed or two. Where must all those photos be now? How many survive? 

It's also worth pointing out the lack of women in this photo. I can count only 4, possibly 5.
